website_summaries.verdict: Offer better sound than most noise-cancelling headphones, and the Bluetooth connectivity and technology adapt to your surroundings.
pros: Work on a variety of platforms, from Apple to Android 4.1 or higher
Long battery life and great sound quality make these a must for those seeking quality headphones for music and more
cons: Durability is iffy, with the head cushion separating and static lessening the sound quality over time

website_summaries.verdict: Priced to compete with Bose's QuietComfort 35, the comfortable H.ear On Wireless NC offers impressive sound and noise canceling that make it a strong contender in the category.
pros: The Sony H.ear On Wireless NC is a comfortable premium wireless Bluetooth headphone that sounds impressive for a Bluetooth headphone, performs well as a headset for making calls, and offers effective noise cancellation that adapts to your surroundings
cons: Headphones fold up but don't fold flat
when folded up in carrying case, package is slightly bulky

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset back to Nov 30 2016. So I basically started using it Dec 2016. It's just past half an year, the headset gave up on me. I don't even use it intensively, probably only charge it 3 - 4 times since I owned it. I couldn't charge the headset anymore. Every time when I plug in the charging cable, the charging indication light only flash red for 1 sec and all dead. Very disappointed about the quality of product from Sony. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tobehonest

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: This headphone stopped charging after a couple of weeks. The sound quality was actually fine, but unfortunately it was defective. I'm calling Sony to have it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: T. MATSUBAYASHI

customer_reviews.title: I have several other Sony over ear headphones many cost lest and sound and preform much better. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fist the battery’s are week do not last long. Second have trouble with my iPhone and connection issues the volume does not always work. I get music cuting in and out. 3rd sound quality is just ok but not worth the price very low bass. They are fairly clear but lacking complex coverage. They can be slow to respond and even drop connection. The ear cups are to smal and cause me to break out in zits. I have several other sony over ear headphones many cost lest and sound and preform much better. I do not recommend. Over priced for mediocre sound and price. Look somewhere else. Also I get a delay in sound from video. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: codymac5

customer_reviews.title: Look and sound great
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for headphones that had noise canceling so I could study with noisy housemates and not be directly connected to the pc. These are great! Lightweight headphones that have great sound directly connected and especially Bluetooth. Super comfortable that you don't remember wearing them as you get up to walk around the house. Noise canceling is pretty good as my housemates scare me when trying to get my attention with these on. Comes with a convenient and sturdy carrying case that can fit a few cables in addition to the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: 2 years of owning it, and the right headphone stopped working
customer_reviews.text: NOISE CANCELLING - isn't that impressive. You can still hear people talk. Or outside noises. It can cancel a bird's chirp, that's all. QUALITY - for a $200+ headset - way above other headphone - the quality sucks. My right headphone doesn't work anymore. If a person invests $$$ on a headset, then it better match the quality. SOUND - it's really not that different that a $60 headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones to Drown Out the World
customer_reviews.text: Bought these primarily for air travel. They work great to cancel the noise of busy airports, full flights, and annoying passengers. People tend to leave you alone with the headphones on. Music quality is very good with great high and low response. I also use these while doing chores around the house, as well as low impact weight training and cardio workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good with one caveat on battery life
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Just taking a star off, as I do not think they can last 20 hours, more like 12-15. Using them on my daily NYC commute that includes 30 minutes walking and 1.5 hours on the subway. Noise cancelling is really strong and helps a lot in that environment. Also tested them in two transatlantic flights and did a pretty good job with the planes engines cutting off the low frequencies but leaving the mid-high ones. However it was super effective with voices and crying babies... Didnlt hear any of that. Comfortable to wear for hours and the voice call quality is much better than using your phone
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty1gr

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great, mids and highs are fairly clear and bass ...
customer_reviews.text: I kind of wish I'd gotten the blue (teal) version, but the black ones were on sale for slightly less at the time of purchase. Sound quality is great, mids and highs are fairly clear and bass feels good too. Noise cancelling blocks out ventilation/fan noise effectively. One more thought - these would be better if the ear cups could rotate further and fold flat. This takes up a large amount of space in my backpack and would not fit in a laptop bag. They may be wireless, but they are not very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Max Hapner

customer_reviews.title: My QUEEN!
customer_reviews.text: Love it since I saw it at the first time. I did struggle since the prices varied a lot between colors, but I still couldn't give up the pink for the price. I wear it on the way to and back from work, and also during the work day when I need to focus on my thing. LOVE the noise cancelling quality.
customer_reviews.author: ludiliu

customer_reviews.title: 6 months and useless
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use at work on board ocean dredging vessel in Alaska. Started out impressed but after less than 25 hours of use the noise canceling feature does not work and sound quality at higher volume levels has seriously degraded. Very disappointing. Will see if I can get them replaced under warranty. Oh I see I’m already outside any possible warranty help? Penalized for planning ahead as I bought these 6 months prior to my Alaska seasonal work, wore them enough beforehand to determine they worked, then stowed them until last week. And I don’t have history of returns. And if I break something I take responsibility. This headset was pathetic
customer_reviews.author: North Pacific Mariner

customer_reviews.title: Only charges when connected to computer
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! They are comfortable and the turquoise color is as pictured. While not an audiophile, I am picky about what I like: deep bass and clear, not tinny trebles. The noise cancelling on these headphones is impressive, very little ambient noise gets in. BUT, why do you have to connect then to a computer to charge them?!?!? I tried several different USB chargers and no charge unless connected to computer. Not convenient at all. Fortunately, a charge lasts forever, I have gone up to 48 hours before feeling the need to recharge while a computer was available.
customer_reviews.author: Doggonefool

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: The headphones may indeed work once charged. Charging is the problem. I spent an hour with Sony tech support and the headphones only charge with a computer USB 2 port. Yes, that is correct, you have to purchase an old computer to charge your new headphones. They do not allow for any wall chargers (not that they won't work) they might ruin your battery. My advice, don't purchase these headphones unless you carry around a computer with you to charge them.
customer_reviews.author: Neal D.

customer_reviews.title: Battery continues to drain even when turned off.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for airplane travel. Very comfortable and I often fall asleep in them with no audio and just the noise cancellation on. However, the battery continues to drain when powered off. At full charge it will drain half the battery over 24 hours while powered off. Its extremely frustrating and horrible for the battery. I have to leave it plugged in all night before each trip. The moment I unplug it the battery will begin to drain. Warranty is only good for 1 year so I guess I'm stuck with it. I regret this purchase and I recommend others steer clear of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pandatrack

customer_reviews.title: Sudden death
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, BUT do not alert you when the battery is dying, they just die. And you cannot turn them on and listen to them while they are charging. So they just suddenly die and are out if commission for a few hours while they charge. These are major design flaws in my opinion, and if I had known I would have bought a different set. My last headphones gave me a few warning beeps to give me some time to get my life together before I had to charge them AND I was able to use them while they charged.
customer_reviews.author: dazydeadpetals

customer_reviews.title: If I am using them with my laptop I use the cord and they are fine. The bluetooth connection to my iPhone however is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of bluetooth/wireless headphones and although they are a bit pricy they are worth every penny. The only reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is because they have difficulty pairing with my macbook air laptop and when they do connect, the audio is glitchy. If I am using them with my laptop I use the cord and they are fine. The bluetooth connection to my iPhone however is spectacular, and aesthetically these headphones look very good. They are slightly bigger, and if you have a smaller head they may feel slightly big, but they are still extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yul Reinstein

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I ever owned! The noise cancellation is great, the bass is great. I never owned Bluetooth headphones before, and now I'm so damn glad I bought these as my first. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Aztec Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Mostly, very good!
customer_reviews.text: I already had two on-ear active noise cancelling headphones but was tired of my ears hurting on long flights. I probably would not have bought this if I hadn't gotten a fantastic deal on a "like new" open box item. The item was perfect and the box was barely damaged. The noise cancelling, sound quality, battery life, and comfort are all very good on this. Minor cons: 1) I wish the earpieces rotated flat so it's more comfortable to wear around you neck 2) Having to charge via a PC in inconvenient. However, I found an inexpensive wall charger made for this headphone on ebay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: with better expression across the whole diapason
customer_reviews.text: For $199 I paid during these holidays they are absolutely worth it. I also own QC35 and slightly prefer these Sony's from the sound point, they just have slightly cleaner sound, with better expression across the whole diapason. Sony ANC is considerably inferior to QC35 however that's still fine for office environment where I use them (block HVAC and other usual office noises just fine). Pretty comfortable though not with the same comfort as QC35 which just fit naturally. Anyway although I can't imagine buying these for original $349 but for $200 it's a steal! would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: IgIg10

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have had in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait around over a year to post this to see if these hold up. Best headphones I have had in a long time. Sound quality is awesome. Despite being plastic, the build holds up. I workout in these and work in a bike shop constantly dropping these headphones and not even a single chip in the plastic. Battery lasts long too
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Acosta

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. This is probably the best headset I have ever owned and I have owned quite a few pairs of headphones in the past including Bose, Audio-technica, Bang and Olufsen, other Sony ones. They are very comfortable to wear and the sound quality is superb. The battery charge is another strong point. I have purchased this item about a month ago and I still have not charged it once and I used it pretty regularly (about 2-3 days a week). Sony knows audio for sure. I recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a good quality bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: futbolista

customer_reviews.title: I was on a plane ride next to the worst woman that I've ever met in my life
customer_reviews.text: I was on a plane ride next to the worst woman that I've ever met in my life. As soon as I got off of the flight, I headed over to Amazon and searched for some noise cancelling headphones. After looking at a few, I got tired of comparing everything and chose these ones. These headphones are great! They're really comfortable and do a great job canceling out annoying noises. I travel every week for work and I have no idea how I got through it prior to owning these.
customer_reviews.author: MCBailey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this product for several months. The audio quality seems quite good to me, although I am not much of an expert on the finer points of audio quality. The noise cancelling feature works quite well for use in a gym. As others have said, you can occasionally pick up some odd sounds if you are walking outside, but overall I would say that the feature is excellent. It is quite comfortable as well. One underrated feature is that it has extraordinarily good battery life. I often do not have to charge it for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Mike27

customer_reviews.title: Good product if you can get it for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones. They don't totally block all noises, but that may be the point. There is a slightly audible hiss, but nothing off-putting. Battery life lasts forever. I took them on two 12 hour plane trips with 10 days in between and never charged them once. Got them on a Cyber Monday deal for $199. I'm not sure they're worth more than that. For $199 they're 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Everything perfect, except comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these, except i feel like the earcups are a bit tight around my ears, which makes them pinch slightly and sweat a bit more than i would like. Colors are as vibrant as the sound. Easy to set up, and wonderful noise cancelling for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KurtisEbear

customer_reviews.title: Dope!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and Noise Cancellation. I test the 'NC' constantly (airplane, car, crowds) and they are amazing. Negative: The earphone case does not have a handle or any way to clip it to a backpack. I literally need to carry it like a football.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It works amazing in a team room
customer_reviews.text: It works amazing in a team room. Finally I'm able to concentrate on my work. Obviously it can't shutdown chat outside entirely, our ears are able to adjust. But if I turn some nature sounds track from youtube, it hides chat entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Valeriy Tolkov

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves them.  Great for quieting noise on an airplane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for long flights, like from Florida to Hawaii. She loves them! I tried the headphones out too and they sound very good. I chose this model over the newer version because of all of the complaints about those breaking. Hope these last. I have yet an older version that I bought for myself quite a few years ago and they are still working and going strong. I wish mine had bluetooth like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve - Broadcast Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones, bluetooth connectivity, great purchase. Active Noice Cancelling could be better but great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I use them every day at work to listen to music and the sound is fantastic. The ability to use these wired or wirelessly is a big feature as to why I wanted these in the first place. It comes with a nice durable case for safe keeping, on ear controls to skip, raise or lower the volume. I have taken one phone call with these, and I heard the caller great, and had no complaints for the person on the other end. The reason for the 4 stars, is I would have loved for the Active Noice Cancelling to be better, when its on, I can still hear faintly hear annoying people around me
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audio snob, but the sound seems great to me! The noise cancellation is amazing, it's a night and day different between when it's on/off - it's almost creepy. Buy these, and you will not regret it. Save a few hundred compared to Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: They’ve also been super helpful in blocking out construction noise outside my home
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write product reviews often. These headphones have been so integral to my life that I needed to share. I got these right before starting a coding boot camp. They were so valuable in terms of noise cancellation and portability. Since then, I’ve started my own company, and these have been paramount to my success, allowing me to set up a distraction-free workspace wherever I go. I wear them almost all day at times, either playing music or streaming audiobooks. They’ve also been super helpful in blocking out construction noise outside my home. All in all, a fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hercule Poirot

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. The build quality is premium and they are extremely comfortable. They also look good. Sound quality is right up there with what you would expect at this price. I tested it out (wired) on some FLAC files I have and the range coverage was very satisfactory. The lows and highs very clear and crisp. I still have some more testing to do on tracks with deeper bass to find out exactly how far it goes and how defined those basses are. I rarely use noise cancelling and is not my main motivation for buying this product. But what I've experienced so far, the NC works great. Bottomline, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: David Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge after 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my wife and they worked well for five months but will not hold a charge any longer. Very disappointed as these are very expensive and a solid brand name
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. A lot of review sites will give the Sony MDR100ABNs a lower review than say their Bose competitors but here's what I love about them.... 1. The are noise canceling but eventhough the foam is not as thick and effective as their Bose competitors they are more comfortable for wearing. 2. They're wireless (bluetooth) which is a must when traveling so you're not getting hung up on cords. 3. The controls and volume are located on the right side of the headphone. Super convenient and great when you want to leave your phone in your pocket or on a charger while you start/stop/next/prev/vol/etc. your songs. Great selling point.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound & ANC but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to keep them but they just are too heavy and uncomfortable for prolonged use. The sound was good, no sound leak and the ANC was much more comfortable than the Bose Quiet Comfort 35s. The ears did get hot and a little sweaty after a few hours of listening to music but it was tolerable. I ended up returning them because they were uncomfortable on the crown of my head and because I disliked that it was mostly all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Maitai

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have read so much about these headphones, but they are disappointing. While the noise cancelling is good, but the bass seems to be very weak. The bass starts to get "shaky" at a certain point, and i found them not loud enough for my use. I compared these with Beats Solo 3, and the Solo 3 has better bass and just sounded better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking headphones with great sound and noise canceling.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these headphones. I wanted some noise canceling headphones, but didn't want to spend the price for Bose. I also wanted something with color to be different and the Viridian Blue looks awesome. The noise canceling is enough to keep most loud nose out while riding the train, but unlike Bose it isn't too strong. I always felt like Bose noise canceling was too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: J_Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything but Sony smart TVs.
customer_reviews.text: Great for everything but listening to my Sony XBR 49" smart TV. Apparently Sony couldn't incorporate current Bluetooth tech into a current model smart TV🤔? VERY SAD☹️. The online tech support was willing to inform me of old tech Sonyheadsets that would work with my Sony current tech Smart TV. Works great with my Motorola phone and my ASUS laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Beck

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Waited awhile to review these because I wanted to put them through their paces before judging them and I can say they didn't disappoint. Took them on vacation and they helped me keep my sanity on a 15 hour plane ride. The noise cancelling works extremely well and the battery life is amazing. I only had to charge them twice during two and a half weeks of heavy use. The case they come in is great for protecting them from damage while there in your bag/backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Snipes

customer_reviews.title: its a very nice looking headphone
customer_reviews.text: First off, its a very nice looking headphone. I just wish Sony had more color options for this headphone, for now I've settled with the matte black. In addition, the noise canceling feature on this headphone amazing. It really blocks a lot of noise. There is no hissing sound like the Beats Studio 2.0 makes. The sound quality is on par with some of the best and most expensive headphones out there. Its a little on the heavy side, but it fits just great. Best of all, for the price on amazon (~$230) I think its a steal!
customer_reviews.author: dannyhabesha

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic headphones. Go toe to toe with Bose QC 25. Excellent sound quality, great NC, and comfortable (a little stiff when new, breaks in over time). They are a little bulky though, and if you have a larger head, they expand width wise and just look massive on your head, and stick out a lot. But amazing bang for the buck, and the color is awesome. I wear these at least 2 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Too small interior space (depth and width) for around-ear-headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Pairs easily, with noise canceling working nicely. Hard case for traveling. Con: very high price — would be a good buy at <$100. Too small interior space (depth and width) for around-ear-headphones. Sound quality is 3.5 out of 5 — loss of high end. Top-of-head band adjustment still leaves a bit too much tension on one’s ears.
customer_reviews.author: FKel

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing and I use the everyday at home and in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and I use the everyday at home and in the office. It is a very noticeable difference in the office as it cuts out the white noise so well. The AC/ heating unit is very noisy and it is virtually silent with this headset. However, I would not expect it to cut anyone talking to you as these really only cut out white noise. Amazing sounds quality and battery life for bluetooth along with an option to use it as a wired set when the batteries die. It was well worth the purchase for any audio file.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones for great price(199
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones for great price(199.99)! It looks cool and it also sounds pretty good! Noise canceling works great, my ear doesnt feel weird and the headphone is so COMFORTABLE, everything just right for a wonderful experience. Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of actual headphones and I am very pleased with the purchase. I love the color but, more importantly, the sound is amazing. It is very clear and balanced, and I can hear the backup singers who aren't normally heard so clearly in regular in ear buds (which I have trouble keeping in my ears). These headphones fit nicely and are also very good at noise canceling.
customer_reviews.author: janniesue

customer_reviews.title: ... looking at the Bose headphones but these things are great! So glad I went with the Sony's instead
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at the Bose headphones but these things are great! So glad I went with the Sony's instead! I wear these things for 1.5 hours a day with two 45min trips on the train to work. Very comfortable for that amount of time and never any issues with Bluetooth staying connected. Highly recommend these to anyone in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B Sherrard

customer_reviews.title: monster(after the break up with beats & toshiba but this one is the best i have found
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several brands over the years ranging from beats, bose, senn, monster(after the break up with beats & toshiba but this one is the best i have found. The comfort is amazing and they are so light weight. I really have no problem with these at all. The battery life is really good i have used them at full volume on a plane trip for 6 hrs and they never died on me. The sound cancellation is really good with the volume on i could barley hear the plane. I would recommend these any day.
customer_reviews.author: LadiesMan217

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, battery life, comfort, and wireless is a game-changer!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for hours, excellent sound, super easy to use, lightweight, and nearly half the cost of Bose QC! Easily recommend these...you won't be disappointed. Just used for 10 hours on flight and didn't make a dent in the battery. I actually like the controls on the headphone and end up using those while phone is in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cain

customer_reviews.title: I like them, just don’t love them
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are solid for entry level NC BT headphones. However the audio quality is lacking slightly. I know these are not meant to provide outstanding low range, but the sound does feel a bit empty in some songs. The headphones are also very bulky on my head and are less than stylish.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Very good noise cancelling—taken them cross country ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Very good noise cancelling—taken them cross country a few times and they were great for 8 plus hours on planes. Also excellent without nc. Phenomenal battery life. No complaints. Got them from Amazon for about half the cost of the Bose QC 35s. Checkout the Wirecutter review—at least for me that review seems right on point.
customer_reviews.author: Max Goeke

customer_reviews.title: Keep my from being "that neighbor" blasting music while working the garage.
customer_reviews.text: I love these for doing yard work or working in the garage when I don't want to annoy the neighbors by blasting my music. Where have noise cancelling bluetooth headphones been all my life.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Initially, they were to right on the head. Overtime, I think I got used to or they expanded a little. Material is top quality. But the thing i like most is the sound. Great outside isolation and fantastic sound. Make every gym visit a blast. Strongly, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rsason

customer_reviews.title: A lot less money that Bose or Beats
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRICE on these, work great. Connected to my AppleTV very easily and without the need for instructions (unless you're somewhat technology challenged). And the noise cancelling really does work! The first time, my daughter started talking to me and I didn't notice her. Now I'm more accustomed to people trying to speak to me. Built-in volume control, bluetooth linking, and a switch to turn off noise cancelling if you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Buyer

customer_reviews.title: These are just wonderful. The digital noise cancelling makes a big difference
customer_reviews.text: These are just wonderful. The digital noise cancelling makes a big difference. I live in the city near a fire department and police department, in a high crime area, but putting these on makes my ears feel like we're back in the suburbs. I do wish I could crank the bass on these though, I haven't figured that out yet, so when I want to really hear the bass I use my MDX50BS earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Sean J.

customer_reviews.title: It work well based on the price range. (Less ...
customer_reviews.text: It work well based on the price range. (Less than 250)....My unit creates strange noise when the plane starts to take off or land. Sound the control circuit is not able to handle the noise which is created from the plane's tires hit the ground. Also, I am not a Sony cell phone user, so I still waiting for the LDAC feature release with Oreo.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Lin

customer_reviews.title: my Peltier ear muffs with sound are as good, though a luttle heavier
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling is O.K. my Peltier ear muffs with sound are as good, though a luttle heavier.. Sound is great. Overall i was looking to kill sound on airplane and either my expectatuons were too high or these are not great.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Douglas A. Bruttomesso

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone Good sound quality good noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Great headphone Good sound quality good noise cancellation, probably second best to the bose. The only problem is comfort, one long hours use i have to adjust it on my ear because it's becoming sore.
customer_reviews.author: Wadah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome headphones. These were my first "nice or expensive" pair of headphones (other then beats solo 1 which I was super disappointed and sold). But I love the headphones. Noise cancelling is awesome, sound quality kicks ***. Just wish they were a tad louder.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Music!
customer_reviews.text: My Favorite Headphones For Music, Can't Hear The Outside Chatter And Gym Feels Like I'm There Alone, Awesome Sound And Great Bass, Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Osburn

customer_reviews.title: It works great for listening to my internet radio stations like France ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now. It works great for listening to my internet radio stations like France Bleu and FIP. The DAC makes speech on internet radio sound good. This is also my daily driver for work and the gym. I bought the extended warranty plan just in case and this has held up numerous instances of me throwing the headphones in my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: David Mills

customer_reviews.title: It is good.
customer_reviews.text: This seems very good so far. I have used it for a few hours. Battery is holding charge. The range is very good. It is as comfortable as Bose QC 25 but the noise cancellation is slightly worse. I can't compare it against the Bose regarding the sound quality as I only use the Bose for its noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: ECMich

customer_reviews.title: No Cons
customer_reviews.text: Compared directly with the Bose 3 something which is also a good product. Fit is better, sounded as good or better, Noise cancelling is similar and not worth bickering over. No question the Corinthian leather and design made this Sony the better choice for me. Battery is excellent. Controls are easy to remember and where they should be. Blue tooth connected as expected. Excellent case, no case for the Bose. Killed it on Cyber Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Spikemark3

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely happy with Sony....
customer_reviews.text: The first order showed up defective and the right speaker did not work at all. A replacement was sent immediately and the new one arrived quickly and works extremely well. They work so well that my wife takes them from me and I'm left using old ear buds. Understandable that they are not Bose or other brands, but these are excellent and offer similar features without the cost.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth & Battery Performance
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really great, I use them almost everyday on my commute to listen to podcasts or music. The noise cancelling is pretty good, it drowns out the background noise in my office almost entirely, but it only dampens the sound of a busy street or commuter train. The bluetooth works really well though, and the battery life is unreal. I also really like the styling, they are very sleek looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Crane

customer_reviews.title: Good. Not for People with Wide Noggins.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. They paired easily with an iPhone 7, and with some fiddling with a little Kokkia Bluetooth dongle with a 3.5 mm plug. Nice color. Also well-made with very good sound. But I'll test them a little longer because the earcups are tighter than would be comfortable with Bose over-the-ear models.
customer_reviews.author: M.D. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a good a deal of time researching what pair of headphones I should get since I'm pretty particular with how my music is delivered. I'm not an audiophile by any means but I am a musician who appreciates high fidelity sound that you can be immersed in. These definitely do it well. They are comfortable, pairing takes half a second, and after letting my dad try them on for a minute he gave me his credit card to buy one for himself haha.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Good sounds quality
customer_reviews.text: Using almost for a year only while working. I haven't faced any issues so far. Works well with/without wireless. Good sounds quality. I rarely use noise canceling but noise canceling feature is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Burak Aktas

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Over Ear
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great over-ear headphone which have a great sound and functionality. I have paired them with my phone which was really easy using NFC and sounded as expected while inline sounded really clear.
customer_reviews.author: Alter

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling is almost as good as my other pair of MDR1000X
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling is almost as good as my other pair of MDR1000X, the sound quality is even closer to MDR1000X or the same. The only thing is missing: touch control and tap control. But, they look better than MDR1000X though.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Natalenko

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Just stopped connecting to blue tooth one day. I tried to pair this headset to other devices. It just cant find it. Had it for 3 years
customer_reviews.author: B. Le

customer_reviews.title: Money well-spent
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones so much. The wireless works great. The charge lasts forever. The sound is great. Sure, I haven't done a back-to-back comparison with its 3 biggest competitors, but this was money well-spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: The headphones provide a very good audio quality and extended battery duration. They are very comfortable on the ear. Compared to the Bose Quiet Comfort, I would say you can save the extra $100, since the difference in audio cancellation and quality is not that much
customer_reviews.author: Johana Alexandra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: High Quality headphone
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, for me is comfortable for 3 o 4 hour, it comes with one cable usb/micro usb charging, and 3.5 audio/sterio cable, a little big for the Gym (I prefer the Vmoda wireless for the GYM) but I think I going to keep it. If you find on sale is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for the past few months and love them. I have used them in flights, office and home. Love the long battery life and they stay connected to BT across a long distance.
customer_reviews.author: johorn17

customer_reviews.title: Great and punchier bass than Bose
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. They connect super quick and last hours upon hours. The only gripe is when it is quite windy the noise cancelling has a hard time and will make a fair amount of noise. If you aren't in a windy place or just use them for movies and music at home like me then they're a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Dean Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones ! Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.text: Love it in every way . The sound Quality is great , it looks premium . No regret !
customer_reviews.author: Hussam

customer_reviews.title: Better than beats!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are soling and they are extremely comfortable. They sync very easily and have an extremely long range ( I went to my kitchen which is downstairs and it remained linked. The noise cancellation is quite impressive and allows me to eliminate any noises that I like to avoid throughout the day. The battery life is also great and the controls are nice to use and feel solid although touch gesture controls on more expensive headphones are better.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Isusi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fly without these!
customer_reviews.text: Flew across country with these... night and day difference. Couldn’t even hear the flight attendants. Highly recommend! Five Stars!
customer_reviews.author: BCCMMC3

customer_reviews.title: These are little better than the other Sony bluetooth noise cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are little better than the other Sony bluetooth noise cancelling headphones. The fit over my ears automatically deadened the street noise better. The noise cancellation is a different and in my opinion better. Only thing that I find a little objectionable, is the power on/off is a little hard to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Donald N.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I used to own a pair of audio-tech ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I used to own a pair of audio-tech noise cancellation headphone. It hurts my ears after two hours into a long dist flight. However, I do not experience such pain with this pair at all. The noise cancellation is very good. Note I never own Bose. I suggest to get a transmitter/receiver to use on a plane, since the entertainment system does not support bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Member

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling feature stopped working within 5 months and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling feature stopped working within 5 months and is now out of warranty. I do not recomend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones. It has been my traveling headset since December 2016. It's still working like new.
customer_reviews.author: Marc101

customer_reviews.title: sound is good, i dont use high volume
customer_reviews.text: sound is good, i dont use high volume, and mostly use them for podcast during my commute or for movies during flights. battery life is really good. i charge them once every other month. use them for about 50 mins a day.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: but it is pretty close and the music sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: Not totally noise cancelling, but it is pretty close and the music sounds amazing. Talking through them on calls is no problem at all, people can't even tell once you get the correct speaking volume.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: They actually work!
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love! I purchased these as a replacement for some cheap headphones that I got during the Prime Day Deals...those were returned and these have been amazing! They are comfortable and the noise cancelling feature is a life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I would give them 5 stars but here are my thoughts: Pros: Noice Cancelling, Great sound, modern look, battery life Cons: Hurt ears after couple of hours, in a quiet surrounding you become the human jukebox (everyone can hear your music). However, very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: david garcia

customer_reviews.title: Lost charge in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these headphones. I bought them in November, but recently they have had 0 battery life. The charge only lasts a couple hours. I used to be able to use these headphones for a few days in a row without charging. Great sound quality, light weight, good for conference calls. I’m very disappointed these didn’t even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headset
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of these headphones. The battery last quite a long time. The sound is good to and it works even when you leave your phone a few rooms over.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Morris

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones out there for 200
customer_reviews.text: I cant go on about how much i love these headphones i use them everyday super comfy and the battery lasts a long time perfect for travling because of the casring case and noise canceling
customer_reviews.author: K. Cowgill

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Comparable quality to the bose but a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Comparable quality to the bose but a way more reasonable price. After extended wear it’s a tiny bit uncomfortable (I notice the Bose are much lighter weight) but not bad. Love love love them for traveling as the noise canceling does wonders to block our plane noise.
customer_reviews.author: B. Taniguchi

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great sound, "just enough" noise cancellation (for me), battery lasts a long time. BT connection is solid. Like most, I wish they'd fold up a bit more compactly, but otherwise, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T_Willy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not best in the market but it sounds very nice in the same price competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Damaged didn’t work correctly contacted seller twice with no response. My son bought these with his owe money and was so excited about getting them, now when he turns them on there is a loud buzzing noise.. very disappointing and hoping they make it right with him 🤞🏻
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but . . . .
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, easy to pair and great sounds. I do wish the on-off button was easier to locate when sitting on your head. Its somewhat recessed and hard to feel. The noise cancelling feature works really well. I work out at our local YMCA and I'm able to tune the ambient noises out around me.
customer_reviews.author: PLJ

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great, and the noise cancelling function on these headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, and the noise cancelling function on these headphones makes the sound better. Very long battery life. Quick charging time. Only complaints? The cushions aren't as soft as others (but seem more durable) and the bluetooth doesn't connect to every device I want it to, such as my laptop or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for several months. I travel extensively and these are the best that I have purchased to date. Wish they had a little better sound canceling quality, but definitely one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Daivs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones and the NFC setup is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: B. Perry

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I recently bought a pair of JBL Everest ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I recently bought a pair of JBL Everest 700 they sound great also they have a little extra punch in the Bass which I like. The Sony H.ear they are more crisp and overall sound even but they are alot more comfortable than the JBL. I like them both.
customer_reviews.author: mark day

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. We have really loud HVAC in the office, and putting on these phones are like walking into a sound-proof chamber. I played music, and I could hear detail and nuances in the music I don't hear anywhere else... sitting right under the HVAC vents.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: The nosie cancellation is magic, I have my fan ...
customer_reviews.text: The nosie cancellation is magic, I have my fan spinning just beside me and I don't really hear the nosie. It pairs really well with High Res audio.
customer_reviews.author: TX

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday use headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing battery life! Sound and noise cancelling are great for the price. The case could be improve in my opinion. Power button is a little recessed compared to NC button so it’s harder to find while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

product_meta.title: Sony MDR100ABN/B Headphones
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBreathtaking sound never looked so good with these wireless Bluetooth headphones with digital noise cancelling that combine High-Resolution sound compatibility, striking design and long-listening comfort. Easy, one-touch connectivity. No distracting background noise. No annoying cables. Just the pure, authentic sound. Get ready to lose yourself in the music. Cord Length: Approx. 3.94 ft; Frequency Response: 5 Hz–40,000 Hz (POWER ON) (Wired); Volume Sensor: Yes
feature_bullets: Hear music at its best with Hi-Res Audio compatibility, Connect and stream music easily with Bluetooth, Focus on the music with Digital Noise Cancelling. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
Listen smarter with Noise Cancelling that adapts to your surroundings, Let the beats flow with Beat Response Control
Enjoy high-quality, hands-free calls, Long-listen comfort

Compatible devices - iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch (iOS 5.0 or later) supporting Hands-free Profile (HFP) iOS 7.X / 8.X / 9.X ; Smartphones - NFC-compatible smartphones installed with Android 4.1 or later. Refer the user manaul under technical specification

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars725 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
